Megatron Revived:

"I will not, you will stay here.  Malice still needs you.  He is quite 
fond of you, leaving would tear apart his spark.  Do not worry about 
your sister, she will be fine.  I can try to arrange to have her 
brought here, but do not expect much.  Do not leave for any reason."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Blacknightmare:
> 
> "She will confort him, perfectly"said bitery the femme, whose 
started to sob again"And dangers outside aren't enough to remain 
here... I just want to come back with my sister... Please" she said 
with tears in her eyes "Be my escourt to go with my sister or let me 
go alone... but I won't remain here a second more ..."
